meanings.definition: An irritating or obnoxious person or animal.
meanings.sent1: That varmint always causes trouble in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The pesky varmint kept knocking over the trash cans.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous varmint stole all the cookies from the jar.
meanings.sent4: The varmint of a neighbor never fails to disrupt the peace.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the sneaky varmint lurking around the garden.

meanings.definition: A troublesome or destructive creature, especially a rodent or insect.
meanings.sent1: The farmer set traps to catch the varmint damaging his crops.
meanings.sent2: A varmint chewed through the wires in the attic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous varmint scurried away with a shiny trinket.
meanings.sent4: The varmint population in the barn needed to be controlled.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overrun by varmints feasting on the vegetables.
